data.name: 意梦世界EmagineWorld
data.detailed_description:
This game is a casual voxel construction game. You can use voxels to build various types of buildings.
The selectable voxels in the game include prisms, pyramids, cylinders, hemispheres, cones, etc., which can be well combined with each other.
In addition to basic blocks, you can also place trees, grasses, flowers, etc. in the scene
You can freely switch the size of voxels. The ratio of the single smallest voxel to the largest voxel is 1:32
The game provides a variety of different styles of voxels, including realistic style and cartoon style, you can choose freely.
data.about_the_game:
This game is a casual voxel construction game. You can use voxels to build various types of buildings.
The selectable voxels in the game include prisms, pyramids, cylinders, hemispheres, cones, etc., which can be well combined with each other.
In addition to basic blocks, you can also place trees, grasses, flowers, etc. in the scene
You can freely switch the size of voxels. The ratio of the single smallest voxel to the largest voxel is 1:32
The game provides a variety of different styles of voxels, including realistic style and cartoon style, you can choose freely.
data.short_description: In this game, you can freely switch the size of the voxel, and the player's perspective can also be converted synchronously. Pyramid voxels allow you to build buildings with angled angles. By slicing voxels into smaller sized voxels, you can create rich details for buildings.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RadeonRX470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: none
  • Additional Notes: none
